general.gigTitle: build, design, develop, redesign your wordpress website

sellerCard.oneLiner: I'm a licensed full stack web developer and designer with over 14 yr
sellerCard.description: ðŸ‘‹ Greetings! I'm Andrew, a Senior WordPress Developer with 14 years of hands-on experience. As a Web Design and Web Development Instructor for 7 years, I've had the pleasure of guiding students globally, backed by my certification in Web Development and Web Design from Haute Ecole Arc IngÃ©nierie University in Switzerland. With a portfolio of over 800 successfully completed projects for clients worldwide, I'm thrilled to offer my expertise and services on Fiverr. description.content:
I am a WordPress Expert, certified web developer, and web designer with 14 years of experience and 7 years as a web instructor. All my work is tailored specifically for each client and all my work is custom, no purchased themes used.


All projects will benefit from:

  • Design and development of your WordPress Website
  • Elementor Pro: All projects include Elementor Pro with a lifetime license at no additional cost to you.
  • Premium Media: All images and videos used are premium Stock (Free for you, with a license)
  • Responsive Website: Mobile and tablet-responsive
  • UX Design, Focused on creating user-friendly interfaces that enhance user experience.
  • Customized Dashboard: Designed to meet your specific needs.
  • Optimization and Security: Your site will be fast, secure, and optimized for performance.
  • Unlimited Revisions: I offer unlimited revisions to ensure your complete satisfaction.
  • Custom Coding: Expert in CSS, JS, and PHP for any custom functionality you need.
  • Thank you page for Forms
  • "How to" Videos and explanatory videos
  • 1w to 3 Months of FREE Support and Maintenance
  • On request, I provide hosting services, with the first 6 months FREE


Contact me for a portfolio or to discuss your project.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide support and maintenance?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I offer support and maintenance for your WordPress website based on the package you choose: 1 week of FREE support for the Basic Gig, 1 month for the Standard Package, and 3 months for the Premium Package. During this time, I will also teach you how to handle everything independently.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide hosting?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, upon request, I offer hosting for your WordPress website with cPanel and full access. The first month is free, and after that, there is a fixed fee. I can also recommend reliable hosting providers and assist with the setup.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide images and videos?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, for your WordPress website, I include premium stock images, graphics, videos, and icons at no additional cost as part of the gig.

reviews.comment:
Andrew exceeded all our expectations, and we couldn't be happier with the outcome. If you need a top-notch web developer, look no further. Andrew N. is the one to contact!  See for yourselves: https://rkmechanicalairservices.com/

We approached Andrew N. to check our existing website, and he immediately stood out from other fiverr pros by recording a detailed and very helpfull video even before we placed any order. In the video, he broke down all the issues our website had and explained how they should be fixed. Andrew was incredibly polite and patient, answering all our questions and even getting on a call with us prior to us placing an order.

When he started working on developing a new website based on the old version, he transformed everything into a piece of gold. His deep understanding of coding made it easy to execute any requirements we had. His expertise in UX design made our website high on conversion potential. The entire process was smooth, pleasant, and exciting.

After having bad experiences with other web developers before finding Andrew, I was thrilled to finally find someone who truly knows what he's doing. Andrew brought his expertise to the table, offering insights and advise based on his understanding of our business, and transformed the website organization and purpose, instead of just following a plain, simple template, with no deep analytics. It was so-so-so refreshing!

If I could give 10-star review, I would! 

Andrew, thank you so much! Cannot wait to work with you on our other projects!

Andrew was quick to understand our requirements and with his exceptional skills crafted exactly what we wanted to represent our corporate image, in the form of snappy website. He is a consummate professional. He focuses on the task at hand and gets things delivered on time, without cutting edges in functionality or quality. Well done.

Andrei is an outstanding professional with exceptional attention to detail and a customer-oriented approach. It was a true pleasure to work with him, thanks to his dedication, clear communication, and impeccable documentation. He exceeded expectations with tailored, well-thought-out solutions, demonstrating a rare level of professionalism. I highly recommend him!
Andrew is the best! He is very thoughtful and detail oriented while still having a very string technical base where he can code almost anything.

Andrew N. was phenomenal in developing my landing page! He exceeded expectations with his attention to detail and consistent communication. Working with him is always so great with his quick with deliveries, and always goes ABOVE AND BEYOND ðŸ™Œ. Highly recommend!

consultationData.description: During our consultation, I'll analyze your website and create a custom plan to enhance functionality, design, UI/UX, and SEO, ensuring optimal performance for your WordPress Website.
